nodes.text: Gandorthral Atmospherics was a company in operation during the Galactic Civil War that manufactured atmospheric engineering and survival gear.

The company was notable for its production of large industrial equipment for terraforming operations, as well as personal survival gear such as breath masks and other goods for the private sector. The company apparently took an anti-Imperial stance following the destruction of Alderaan by the first Death Star, and its products were promoted for use on worlds polluted by the Empire.
The company used units of the LesTech M38-series explorer droid to test their survival gear and atmosphere breathers on Outer Rim planets with harsh environment.
